channel.title: CVE Feed for Arm Ltd -- Arm 5th Gen GPU Architecture Kernel Driver

item.title: CVE-2024-1395|2024-06-04T18:00:45.931Z -- arm%20ltd -- arm%205th%20gen%20gpu%20architecture%20kernel%20driver
item.description: Use After Free vulnerability in Arm Ltd Arm 5th Gen GPU Architecture Kernel Driver allows a local non-privileged user to make improper GPU memory processing operations. If the systemâ€™s memory is carefully prepared by the user, then this in turn could give them access to already freed memory. This issue affects Arm 5th Gen GPU Architecture Kernel Driver: from r41p0 through r47p0.
